sentences.en: Can you see any delays in reimbursement in the future?
sentences.cn: 那么,你看将来你们对外偿付会有延误 吗 ?

sentences.en: Education reimbursement is like a raise in your salary.
sentences.cn: 教育补偿就相当于加薪.

sentences.en: Have reimbursement capacity, somebody assures ability lends usurious money.
sentences.cn: 有还款能力 、 又有人担保才能借到高利贷款.

sentences.en: He received reimbursement for his travel expenses.
sentences.cn: 由于出差的花费,他可以得到公司的补偿.

sentences.en: In reimbursement of these expenses, please draw on us.
sentences.cn: 为了付还这些费用, 请开票向我方支取.

sentences.en: In reimbursement of these extra expenses, please draw on us.
sentences.cn: 请开汇票向我方支款, 用于偿付这些额定费用.

sentences.en: Prepare monthly expense reimbursement and double check relative documents.
sentences.cn: 负责费用报销凭证的审核,准备工作.

sentences.en: She is demanding reimbursement for medical and other expenses.
sentences.cn: 她正在索赔医药费和其他花费。

sentences.en: Staff payroll, expense reimbursement , C & B , VAT calculation and distribution.
sentences.cn: 员工薪金计算发放, 费用 报销, 增值税的计算和缴纳.

sentences.en: The current reimbursement guidelines for expenses remain in effect.
sentences.cn: 目前的偿还指引开支仍然有效.

sentences.en: The reimbursement authorization should not be subject to an expiry date.
sentences.cn: 偿付授权书不应规定有效日期.

sentences.en: WE SHALL EFFECT REIMBURSEMENT TO THE BANK DESIGNATED BY THE NEGOTIATING BANK.
sentences.cn: 我们会立即向议议付行指定的银行偿付款项.

sentences.en: Which forms do I need complete for my travel reimbursement.
sentences.cn: 我需要填什么表格可以报销我的旅费?

sentences.en: Which forms do I need to complete for my reimbursement?
sentences.cn: 我需要填什么表来报销我的差旅费?

sentences.en: Which forms do I need to complete for my travel reimbursement?
sentences.cn: 我需要填什么表来报我的旅费?

trans.tran_en: If you receive reimbursement for money that you have spent, you get your money back, for example because the money should have been paid by someone else
